entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:56 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:56 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:56 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
